Company Overview.Name: Bajaj Healthcare Ltd
Company Overview.Business Description: Incorporated in 1993, Bajaj Healthcare Ltd manufactures a wide range of Active Pharmaceutical Ingredients and Formulations. BHL is focused on development, supply, manufacturing of Amino Acids, Nutritional Supplements and Active Pharma Ingredients for Pharmaceutical, Nutraceuticals and Food industries. It manufactures active pharmaceutical ingredients and formulations in the form of tablets, capsules, powder, etc. for ~ 550+ clients, exporting bulk drugs to ~ 62+ countries in Europe, USA, Africa, Australia, etc.
